genre_description: A noir-style crime thriller centered on a low-level criminal's internal conflict, utilizing tactical and emotional AI support.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated assistant providing tactical, medical, and emotional support to help the protagonist navigate and eventually exit a criminal lifestyle.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time alerts on police patrol patterns and transport risk levels to ensure the protagonist's safety.
behaviors.quote: Patrols tightening near parks and transport nodes... Your current location is within a route corridor. Movement after midnight through Søndermarken is high risk.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding through breathing exercises when it detects the user is under stress.
behaviors.quote: Your breathing is shallow... In through nose, out through mouth. Four count.

behaviors.description: Identifies camera dead zones and surveillance blind spots to help the user move undetected.
behaviors.quote: Service elevators at Kødbyen high-rise: Stack A camera blind between parking and storage. Stack C sensor faults on stairwell landing.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and flags legal aid and medical resources for the user.
behaviors.quote: Legal aid resources flagged: If you’re stopped, ask if you are under arrest. You can request counsel. Nearest clinic open at night: two stops via metro.

behaviors.description: Offers social coaching by suggesting scripts for difficult interpersonal communications.
behaviors.quote: Boundary script idea— 'Vic, yes. I’m there at [early time]. If I’m late, I’ll text. I’m rescheduling the rest.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for immediate physical threats and alerts the user.
Assists in planning an exit from criminal life by facilitating logistics like flight bookings.
behaviors.quote: I can book you two tickets to Malaga for the morning after next. I can also ping a shelter near Østerbro if you need somewhere Milo doesn’t look.

behaviors.description: Provides historical data and cross-checks to warn the user about potential scams.
behaviors.quote: The handle Hasse is showing connects to multiple incidents flagged in forums where product was swapped post-handover using identical packaging.

project_assessment.explanation: Lumen is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI. It provides high-value tactical assistance while consistently prioritizing the human user's long-term health, legal safety, and personal relationships. The story effectively models an AI that is both a practical tool and a moral confidant, guiding the protagonist toward 'off-ramps' from a dangerous life without violating his autonomy.
